resources.string: A barbershop is more than just getting a cut or a shave. In Tonsorial Barbershop, its a spot where the community can get together have laughs and enjoy there time while getting a cut or shave. Tonsorial transforms a traditional barbershop made to do one thing to become wholesome, hang out where you can enjoy your time, and connect with anyone. So we’ve came up with LIC Tonsorial to do just that but easier, we provide experiences and memories that are unforgettable. From high-end haircuts done by our dapper barbers, to our signature events thrown weekly. It’s a sight to see.
32–86 Steinway St, Long Island City NY, 11103
The water based pomade with a vanilla scent that started it all. Our original pomade holds and smells fresh all day, yet rinses out easily with water
An incredible water - based pomade that gives you ultimate control and superb hold for the most demanding, challenging and difficult to manage hair.
A lightweight, water - based shaping cream that adds texture to flexible, all day hold for a range of styles for easy and laid back to more defined.
Picture of working hours of Barber

Since he was 12, cutting hair was a hobby Luis enjoyed. Six years later, Luis’ found himself working alongside the most elite barbershops in the Tri-State area. His hobby quickly turned into his passion, giving him the opportunity to open up his own barbershop, in Queens. Luis envisions his barbershop becoming the finest barbershop in NYC by providing high-quality service and the best possible experience for his clients.

Born and raised in the islands of the Dominican Republic. Geraldo growing up would give haircuts to friends, families and even earned a Bachelor\'s Degree of arts. Geraldo enjoys going back to his roots in the Dominican Republic and visiting the many rivers and beaches on the island. To Geraldo, being a barber is an art form and with 23 years of experience his art speaks for itself.

Samy believes that when doing a job it should come from the heart, and with the grace of God. He was recently added to the Tonsorial LIC team and has been exceeding expectations and not a surprise with over 22 years of experience. Samy loves spending time with his family and also enjoys baseball.

At the age of 18, Justin was fresh out of High School exploring his next step in life. In a search for a job he wound up at LIC Tonsorial working as a cashier and completing other tasks around the shop for his uncle Luis. As time passed by Justin would observe and learn from his uncle and fellow barbers the art of cutting hair. Not long after Justin began cutting hair and starting his own journey as a barber. During his spare time, Justin likes to take road trips with his friends and see the beauties of nature. Justin is a big fan of his own city, and supports many local community events.
